narrative:
This was a focused inspection to evaluate the male dachshund (chip #067 538 814) and female French bulldog
(chip #093 577 310) that were cited on the March 24, 2016 inspection.  Both of these dogs have received veterinary
evaluations.   No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Inspection and exit interview conducted with a facility representative, Dr. Margaret Shaver, VMO and Kendall Lundy,
ACI.
Additional Inspectors
Shaver Margaret, Veterinary Medical Officer
